entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
